Verse1:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\lang2057\f0\fs20 You confide in those who fear You,
\par Share the secrets of Your heart,
\par Friendship give to those who seek to
\par Honour You with every part.
\par Though I'm one of unclean lips, Lord,
\par I am crying 'Woe is me!'
\par Trying now to rid myself of
\par All the things that hinder me from...
\par }
Verse2:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\lang2057\f0\fs20 There is one thing You have spoken,
\par There are two things I have found:
\par You, O Lord, are ever loving,
\par You, O Lord, are always strong.
\par I am longing to discover
\par Both the closeness and the awe,
\par Feel the nearness of Your whisper,
\par Hear the glory of Your roar, just...
\par }
Title: You confide in those who fear You (The friendship and the fear)
TitleX: You confide in those who fear You (The friendship and the fear)
Author: Matt Redman

Verse1:
{\rtf1\ansi\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang2057\f0\fs20 Thy sons and daughters, Lord, behold,
\par More precious than the finest gold,
\par O guide them with Thine eye!
\par Thy Holy Spirit richly pour,
\par And fill their hearts this gracious hour,
\par That they may prophesy.
\par }
Verse2:
{\rtf1\ansi\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang2057\f0\fs20 May signs and wonders still be wrought,
\par And numbers, by their preaching brought
\par To know the truth divine:
\par May all the powers of hell give way,
\par And thousands, taught to sing and pray,
\par In holy worship join.
\par }
Title: Thy sons and daughters
TitleX: Thy sons and daughters
Author: Anonymous

Verse1:
{\rtf1\ansi\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang2057\f0\fs20 Baby Jesus in the manger,
\par To the world He's still a stranger.
\par Wise men bring their gifts
\par Of gold and myrrh,
\par Baby Jesus in the manger.
\par }
Verse2:
{\rtf1\ansi\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang2057\f0\fs20 Gentle Jesus, meek and lowly,
\par Full of love so pure and holy.
\par He will teach and pray,
\par Show mankind the way,
\par Gentle Jesus, meek and lowly.
\par }
Verse3:
{\rtf1\ansi\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang2057\f0\fs20 Loving Jesus, mocked and beaten,
\par He the sin of man has taken.
\par He has paid the price,
\par He has given His life,
\par Loving Jesus, mocked and beaten.
\par }
Verse4:
{\rtf1\ansi\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang2057\f0\fs20 Mighty Jesus, He is risen,
\par He has broken out of prison.
\par He has conquered sin,
\par Brought new life to men,
\par Mighty Jesus, He is risen.
\par }
Title: Baby Jesus In The Manger
TitleX: Baby Jesus In The Manger
Author: Gill Broomhall
Copyright: 1992 Kingsway's Thankyou Music & Sovereign Music UK. Adm. by Kingsway's Thankyou Music, PO Box 75, Eastbourne, East Sussex, BN23 6NW, UK tym@kingsway.co.uk. Used by permission.

Chorus:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\lang2057\f0\fs20 I will join the song
\par An ancient melody
\par A song that I will sing
\par For all eternity
\par It's all around the world
\par Hearts in harmony
\par Worship to the King
\par Who reigns eternally
\par I will join the song and sing
\par }
Title: On holy ground (Join the song)
TitleX: On holy ground (Join the song)
Author: Martyn Layzell, Nathan Fellingham & busbee

Chorus:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\lang1033\f0\fs20 This is the anthem of the free,
\par This is the song of the redeemed,
\par Jesus, Your praises rising
\par Higher and higher and higher.
\par We'll sing it loud, we'll sing it strong,
\par We'll sing it all around the world,
\par Jesus, Your praise will last
\par Forever and ever and ever.
\par }
Title: This is the anthem of the free (Anthem of the free)
TitleX: This is the anthem of the free (Anthem of the free)
Author: Matt Redman

Title: Jesus Jesus Jesus (Jesus how I love Your name)
TitleX: Jesus Jesus Jesus (Jesus how I love Your name)
Author: Dave Bilbrough

Chorus:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\lang2057\f0\fs20 I know words can't declare
\par The feelings I bring to You
\par I will climb to the highest heavens
\par For one glimpse of You
\par With everything I worship You
\par I lift my hands up
\par Lift my hands up
\par I lift my hands up to You
\par Open my heart up
\par Open my heart
\par Declare that it's true
\par There is no one who loves like You
\par }
Bridge:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\lang2057\f0\fs20 I know words can't declare
\par The feelings I bring to You
\par I will climb to the highest heavens
\par For one glimpse of You
\par With everything I worship You
\par I lift my hands up
\par Lift my hands up
\par I lift my hands up to You
\par Open my heart up
\par Open my heart
\par Declare that it's true
\par There is no one
\par Lift your hands up
\par Lift your hands up
\par Lift your hands
\par }

Verse2:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\lang2057\f0\fs20 You made it all
\par Said "Let there be"
\par And there was all that we see
\par The sound of Your voice
\par The works of Your hands
\par You do all things well
\par You do all things well
\par You do all things well
\par }

Author: Chris Tomlin, John Michael Clement & Jesse Reeves
